name: Angsty Debates
description:
Game made for Mix n Jam 2020, theme: 'Mixing Genres'.

In this game a Reaction-based game meets a Typing game!

Play as a politician running for public office, you must deliver your speech during the debate by typing the text on your thought bubble avoiding typos, while keeping an eye out an dodging potential items thrown by angsty spectators unhappy at your policies.

Controls

Use keyboard keys to type out the message on screen.

Use arrow keys to dodge when prompted on screen.

Use the Escape key to quit the game.

How to play

Just type out the greyed out text on your keyboard, and when prompted press arrow keys.

The game is mostly a mock up, new message will appear when the current out has been typed out, and each new type the game is played different messages will appear. 

Besides that the game is mostly unfinished: failing to press and arrow key when prompted or commiting too many typos will have no effect, and at some point the game will loop on the same message until quit by pressing Escape.

Source assets
  • 3D models - Synty Polygon assets
  • Animations - Mixamo and Unreal Marketplace
  • Audio - gamesounds.xyz and Kenney.nl
